text: Kananjalo inene uYûsuf weza kuni, mandulo, enemiqondiso ecacileyo, kodwa nina anizanga nipheze ukukuthandabuza oko weza nako kuni: wada wafa, naqala nina nathi “Akukho Mprofeti uAllâh Aya kumthumela emveni kwakhe. Wenza njalo ke uAllâh ukukhokelela ekulahlekeni lowo ungumenzi wobubi nalowo uthandabuza izilumkiso zika-Allâh
